resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105983</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105983</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206752</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Career Voyages</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Karriere-Reisen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Voyages de Carrière</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Viagens Da Carreira</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Viaggi Di Carriera</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ταξίδια σταδιοδρομίας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Viajes De la Carrera</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">explores career options in advanced manufacturing, automotive, construction, energy, financial services, health care, hospitality, information technology, retail, and transportation industries, as well as in emerging industries -- biotechnology, geospatial technology, and nanotechnology. Learn which industries are growing, how to qualify for a good job, and where to get started.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">erforscht Karriereoptionen in hochentwickelter 
Herstellung, Automobil, Aufbau, Energie, finanzielle Services, 
Gesundheitspflege, Gastfreundschaft, Informationstechnologie, 
Einzelverkauf und Transportindustrien, sowie in auftauchenden 
Industrien -- Biotechnologie, geospatial Technologie und 
nanotechnology. Erlernen Sie welche Industrien wachsen, wie man 
für einen guten Job kennzeichnet und wohin man begonnen erhält.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">explore des options de carrière à la fabrication
avançée, des véhicules à moteur, la construction, l'énergie, les 
services financiers, la santé, l'hospitalité, la technologie de 
l'information, le détail, et les industries de transport, aussi bien 
que dans des industries naissantes -- biotechnologie, la technologie 
geospatial, et le nanotechnology. Apprenez quelles industries se
développent, comment qualifier pour un bon travail, et où obtenir 
commencé.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">explora opções da carreira em manufacturing 
avançado, automotriz, construção, energia, serviços financeiros, 
cuidado de saúde, hospitality, tecnologia de informação, varejo, e 
indústrias do transporte, as.well.as em indústrias emergentes -- 
biotechnology, tecnologia geospatial, e nanotechnology. Aprenda 
que indústrias estão crescendo, como qualificar para um trabalho 
bom, e aonde começar começado.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">esplora le opzioni di carriera nel manufacturing 
avanzato, automobilistico, costruzione, energia, servizi finanziari, 
sanità, ospitalità, tecnologia dell'informazione, vendita al 
dettaglio ed industrie del trasporto, così come nelle industrie 
d'emersione -- la biotecnologia, tecnologia geospatial e 
nanotechnology. Impari quali industrie stanno sviluppandosi, 
come qualificarsi per un buon lavoro e dove ottenere iniziato.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ερευνά τις προαιρετικές δυνατότητες σταδιοδρομίας στην
προηγμένη κατασκευή, την αυτοκίνητη, κατασκευή, την ενέργεια, τις
οικονομικές υπηρεσίες, την υγειονομική περίθαλψη, τη φιλοξενία, 
την τεχνολογία πληροφοριών, τη λιανική πώληση, και τις 
βιομηχανίες μεταφορών, καθώς επίσης και στις αναδυόμενες 
βιομηχανίες -- βιοτεχνολογία, geospatial τεχνολογία, και 
νανοτεχνολογία. Μάθετε ποιες βιομηχανίες αυξάνονται, πώς να
είναι κατάλληλοι για μια καλή εργασία, και πού να πάρουν 
αρχισμένες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">explora opciones de la carrera en la fabricación 
avanzada, automotor, construcción, energía, los servicios 
financieros, cuidado médico, hospitalidad, tecnología de 
información, venta al por menor, y las industrias del transporte, 
así como en las industrias que emergen -- biotecnología, tecnología
geospatial, y nanotechnology. Aprenda qué industrias están 
creciendo, cómo calificar para un buen trabajo, y adonde conseguir 
comenzado.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206752</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105983</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/career-voyages</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
